Reviews.Title: Great phone for older people!
Reviews.Author: M. S. Velazquez
Reviews.Content: I must say I got this cell phone for my mother who's around her sixties and she hates advanced phones so she was looking for something simple. So I got on Amazon searching for her favorite phone color which is Pink and found this phone that was ATT and unlocked. Then I immediately showed her and she fell in love with it because it was something simple and basic she can use when she needs to keep in contact with all her family. When the phone arrived it was a very nice phone and something anyone can figure out. Over all I totally recommend this phone to anyone who doesn't like advanced touch screen phones or those smart phones, this phone is perfect for someone who just wants it for taking pictures and talking on the cell phone for constant communication.

Reviews.Title: BEST PHONE
Reviews.Author: Elaine G. LaMotte
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE 2nd ONE THAT I BOUGHT. THE FIRST ONE LASTED OVER 2 YEARS AND WOULD HAVE LASTED LONGER IF I HADN'T DROPPED IT ON THE PAVEMENT AT WORK 100 OR MORE TIMES. I'VE HAD 3 OTHERS SINCE & CAME BACK TO THIS 1, ONCE I FOUND IT ON AMAZON!! MUCH CHEAPER THAN THE FIRST 1 I GOT FROM MY CARRIER!!

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: M. Shaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a Motorola Razr which was defective.  This phone is basic, easy to use, good size keys,good reception, and holds a charge for a few days. It is made of plastic (and feels a bit flimsy), but for the price, it is a great phone.  It came with a wall charger, so the add-on in the Amazon posting to get the wall charger (which I did) was not necessary.  It did not come with a car charger.

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work at all
Reviews.Author: nnyklw
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my young daughter and she loved the color and the flip model. However, it came in a box that was clearly used, rundown and unsealed. The phone had Rogers Telecom on it which looked at if it was refurbished. I thought I had bought a brand new phone. We tried to charge the phone and it did not work nor light up. We left it overnight and it still did not work so we called TigerDirect and because we ordered it from Amazon, they processed the return.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: DBW
Reviews.Content: I ordered this to replace my mom's black 6085 that she had for a couple of years.  This is her favorite phone and I was so glad to find it on here and for such a great price.  I will be ordering another one to keep an extra for her on the chance her's dies again in another year or so.  It was new and in all original packaging.  Awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: Basic flip phone
Reviews.Author: House Music
Reviews.Content: I have to admit, I love this phone. I'm on my 4th one in as many years (maybe longer). I do landscape work and I keep this phone in my pocket all day. I crush it, sweat profusely on it, drop it (frequently) and use it constantly. Eventually the fate it suffers from all my abuse is that the display goes out, I have to wonder if it has something to do with the flip action. I don't know of a touch screen phone that would stand up to this kind of abuse. The only down sides are texting with it sucks, but I only text moderately and I don't use this phone for internet purposes as it would probably be very limited. I do go online and download songs and games (only text twist and bejeweled). That is the other bad thing about this phone it doesn't have much space, I have to download  pictures to an sd mini card or email them to myself so I can keep them and eventually erase some text messages especially if they contained images. This phone does not receive video sent to me but it does have one really cool feature that many phones don't, I can zoom in on pictures that are sent to me. If you want a durable basic phone that has great reception I highly recommend this model. At&t; is my provider, I don't know if this phone works for other providers and I would be careful who I bought it from (see other reviews)

Reviews.Title: WORST ONLINE EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE
Reviews.Author: Allan G.
Reviews.Content: I ordered a pink phone and got a black one instead. The black phone would not power up. I immediately returned the item several weeks ago and have still not gotten credit for the return. The worst rating available is 1 star but if possible I would rate this 00000 stars because absolutely NOTHING was done correctly!

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: Mairead Barry
Reviews.Content: Just bought this for a little fun. Colour ok, the finish isn't very strong. After a few days of use a chip appeared in the casing. This was a little disappointing, but aside from this one cosmetic fault, I enjoy this phone. I can take photo, they may not be top quality, but I'm not complaining. What can you expect for the prize. Overall it functions great, I use it alot and it's never given me any trouble to date. For anyone just needing a basic phone, I would highly recommed this one.

Reviews.Title: Recommend this phone to anyone who likes flip phones!
Reviews.Author: Jay or Bernadine Collicott
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived with incorrect battery.  Impressed with customer service, they called me and are sending a new, replacement battery immediately.  Phone works great, just as my husband wanted.  Easy to use, easy to find , love the phone.  Customer service is awesome!

Reviews.Title: like the phone
Reviews.Author: ngibbs3
Reviews.Content: I love the color to the phone its just your sims have to be unlocked. But the phone came with everything you need to run the phone besides the sims. It is an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: Going for ever.
Reviews.Author: Anamika
Reviews.Content: My mother in law is using this model phone for the last  5 years, and is still working. Bought this new one again as the old one worked so good, and she loved this phone very much.

Reviews.Title: display went out
Reviews.Author: c.gus andreadis
Reviews.Content: display went out,  phone is not that old , junk, dont buy this phone you will not like it when it stops working

Reviews.Title: The phone is junk!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The phone is junk! Looks like the original but isn't! Doesn't have most of the features the original phone had! Just the case is the same.

Reviews.Title: A++++++ Seller
Reviews.Author: JoAnne Stone
Reviews.Content: Although this phone is "refurbished", it's just like new in every way.  I love it!  Planning to get one for my boyfriend, too!

Reviews.Title: nokia 6805
Reviews.Author: Evan Lobo
Reviews.Content: it was gift for my lady and she loves her cell- this is the second similar one i have got her

Reviews.Title: This one missed the boat.
Reviews.Author: Clive L. Sinoff "CLS"
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of the Nokia 6085 phones. They are small, hold charge well and are reasonably durable. If you don't want a smart phone this is a good choice, and many are available at a good price. Unfortunately, this one came with a small piece missing at the charger port.

Reviews.Title: Favorite Pink Phone
Reviews.Author: Joann
Reviews.Content: I had this phone before but unfortunately it did not make it through the wash.  It is a basic phone with large numbers that are easy to use.  Nothing fancy, but my favorite!

Reviews.Title: Pink Nokia
Reviews.Author: Kathryn P. Clark
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed this phone, the Nokia Pink flip phone has so many things locked.I had no idea that it would be any different than if I had gone down to At&T; and bought, at least that's the impression you gave. I would not buy another products of this kind or any other kind.  I believe that information was left out of you ad, that would have made a difference in my purchase. I am 68 years old and feel that I was miss led.

Reviews.Title: Just Arrived but BATTERY & MANUAL not originals
Reviews.Author: Pink Panther "Pink Panther"
Reviews.Content: I don't like reviews that really don't rate the actual product, but I feel I must rate the contents of this phone's box ... and the vendor UNLOCKED CELL PHONE KINGS INC. The manual is a joke and is a Nokia generic black & white 8-pager. I question that it is even by Nokia since I subsequently downloaded the real Nokia user manual for this phone from another site (114 pages compared to 8). And the battery is made in China and has no indication it is an OEM version. Also, it was fully charged when it arrived. THEREFORE, I presume I have been sold a used phone with a worthless, self-printed manual and a Chinese non-OEM battery. I would not recommend buying from this vendor. If I have problems with the phone, I'll report back.

Reviews.Title: Gran telefonito
Reviews.Author: Melanie Bello
Reviews.Content: Estoy muy contenta con este telefono, es sencillo y práctico, sus funciones son muy agradables en la pantalla y es bastante liviano.

Reviews.Title: Great solid phone. Nokia quality for an unbeatable price.
Reviews.Author: Curious67
Reviews.Content: Phone worked fine. No problem, no trouble. Tried it with several phone companies in Brazil. Worked all right. Nice phone. A bit clunky, not super thin.I had one for 2 years and now bought this one. I am hopeful it will last for a long time, too.

Reviews.Title: DON'T GET THIS PHONE!! DON'T BUY FROM ECOCELL!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Greenwalt
Reviews.Content: Both are bad news.  I am out the expense and stuck with a defective phone; the seller won't honor the warranty and blames the problem on, "You must have dropped the phone and caused the defect!" The camera never worked right from the start and everyday it got worse, pixelating and soon, getting stuck in camera so that I had to remove the battery to unstick it!  STAY AWAY!!

Reviews.Title: Second Try Worked!
Reviews.Author: k
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone and the first one I ordered did not work, the space button would get stuck when texting. So I sent it back and got another one shipped to me and it works great so far.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Mick
Reviews.Content: Nokia 6085 Unlocked Cell Phone with MP3/Video Player, MicroSD Slot-International Version with No Warranty (Black)I looked up reviews of this the Nokia 6085, it seemed just what I wanted to take back to New Zealand.  Fine, it works with our local providers (Telecom), The display is good, the Buttons are large enough for my big fingers,BUT the battery is flat within 48hours. OK I bought another battery and the same thing happens, so it's rubbish for this phone. I have a lot of respect for Nokia phones. I must have bought a bad one.
